World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 2 月 9 日星期五 05:24:45 GMT 120
Indonesia survey projects presidential hopeful Prabowo gaining majority votesIndonesian presidential candidate Prabowo Subianto is projected to pip the 50% threshold needed to win the Feb. 14 election in a single round, the latest opinion poll showed on Friday. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 04:36:35 GMT WXV5FOHGUVPIZFE5ALNRBM2YDU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-survey-projects-presidential-hopeful-prabowo-gaining-majority-votes-2024-02-09/Reuters世界亚太地区
Cat lover campaigns for animal rights in Indonesia electionsIndonesian Francine Widjojo is hitting the campaign trail with cats and treats in hand to run as a Jakarta legislative candidate and raise awareness of animal cruelty along the way. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 04:31:06 GMT IZWAHH5CMNJQHOFF46DXELKH24 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/cat-lover-campaigns-animal-rights-indonesia-elections-2024-02-09/Yuddy Budiman世界亚太地区
China's New Year travel rush kicks into high gear, country adds record number of trainsChina on Friday kicked into high gear on the eve of the annual Lunar New Year holiday, with travellers cramming onto trains and planes to head back to their hometowns and families preparing for traditional reunion dinner gatherings. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 04:23:01 GMT QZBNQVAEXFOSXAQ5TPKLXKDZTA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinas-new-year-travel-rush-kicks-into-high-gear-country-adds-record-number-2024-02-09/Reuters世界亚太地区
Ex-Indonesia leader Megawati advises cabinet not to quit amid criticism of JokowiA former Indonesian president and chief of its biggest party has advised ministers not to quit outgoing President Joko Widodo's cabinet, amid media reports of possible resignations over his perceived meddling in next week's presidential election. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 04:06:21 GMT EMNYY2K6GBORPAXHOGRIC2PIWU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/ex-indonesia-leader-mekawati-advises-cabinet-not-quit-amid-criticism-jokowi-2024-02-09/Reuters世界亚太地区
Biden says Gaza fighting 'over the top,' pushing for a pauseU.S. President Joe Biden on Thursday suggested that Israel's military response in Gaza has been "over the top" and said he is seeking a "sustained pause in the fighting" to help ailing Palestinian civilians. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 01:44:39 GMT PHKQK4ZWO5NGFD73YXDI6EHAXE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/biden-says-gaza-fighting-over-top-pushing-pause-2024-02-09/Jeff Mason, Trevor Hunnicutt世界中东
US conducts more strikes on Houthi targets in YemenThe U.S. Central Command forces on Thursday conducted seven "self-defense" strikes against four Houthi unmanned surface vessels and seven mobile anti-ship cruise missiles that were prepared to be launched against ships in the Red Sea, the U.S. military said. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 01:42:43 GMT NSGZQF2SLZJKXCQ64QQZPRVASA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-conducts-more-strikes-houthi-targets-yemen-2024-02-09/Kanishka Singh世界中东
Malaysia's top court strikes out some Islamic laws in landmark caseMalaysia's top court on Friday declared unconstitutional more than a dozen Islamic laws enacted by the state of Kelantan, in a landmark decision that could affect similar sharia laws in other parts of the Muslim-majority country. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 01:32:47 GMT 7FEXAKZMKBLSFJZFEXEE5LP5XU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/malaysias-top-court-declares-16-islamic-laws-kelantan-state-unconstitutional-2024-02-09/Rozanna Latiff, Danial Azhar世界亚太地区
Australia to invest a further $260m on next-generation military dronesAustralia will spend an additional A$400 million ($260 million) to manufacture next-generation military drones - one of a number of locally manufactured projects that will create more jobs, its defence industry minister said on Friday. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 01:29:46 GMT I4O5HHFV5RKKXLFYKZ5ZFNXYUA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-invest-further-260m-next- Generation-military-drones-2024-02-09/Alasdair Pal世界亚太地区
Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore hope to lure Chinese with visa-free travelChinese engineer and aviation enthusiast Wei Ming is exactly the kind of visitor the tourism authorities in Singapore, Malaysia and Thailand are looking for. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 01:10:43 GMT UFMPX2ZVH5JQ3EOJ6RMEPAUMVU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thailand-malaysia-singapore-hope-lure-chinese-with-visa-free-travel-2024-02-09/Xinghui Kok, Lisa Barrington, Orathai Sriring世界亚太地区
Putin says a swap deal to free WSJ reporter Gershkovich might be possibleRussian President Vladimir Putin said in an interview aired on Thursday that it might be possible to free Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich, who is awaiting trial on spying charges, in exchange for a Russian prisoner. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 00:44:45 GMT AFWEASP27ZKBNPHJ4E3A7MWG4Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-says-swap-deal-free-wsj-reporter-gershkovich-might-be-possible-2024-02-09/David Ljunggren世界欧洲
El Salvador ex-security adviser who accused ruling party of corruption dies in custodyA former national security adviser to El Salvador's government, who had accused a congressman from the ruling New Ideas party of corruption and drug trafficking, died in state custody in unclear circumstances, his family told reporters on Thursday. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 00:31:16 GMT 7AXNRSVWRVOYPDDMOSEMQV4Y6E https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/el-salvador-ex-security-adviser-who-accused-ruling-party-corruption-dies-custody-2024-02-09/Reuters世界美洲
